author: Anonymous Beaker
title: 2020 S MT1 Question 6
question:
(@template ListOfPhone)
(define (count lop b c)
  (cond [(empty? lop) 0]
        [else
         (+ (count-phone (first lop) b c)
            (count (rest lop) b c))]))

(@htdf count-phone)
(@signature Phone String Natural -> Natural)
;; Produce 1 if the phone has Brand b and cost less than c, 0 otherwise

(define (count-phone p b c)
  (if (and (string=? (phone-brand p) b) (< (phone-price p) c))
       1
       0))
This is my answer to the 2020 S MT1 Question 6. Instead the answer deals with individual element in the list with a function that produces Boolean (checks whether it meets the requirement) rather than this add 1 if meets requirement. I was wondering if this is also a correct take on the question?
Also my function is actually not passing check-expects. But you get the idea. I would really appreciate if someone could point out where the problem might be.
